overview: Jack — in hiding for laying the wrong girl — believes he can safely return home where he is reunited with his sidekick Lenny. Jack is quickly back in the saddle gaining notoriety as a caller on talk show radio with his self-confidence and claims of sexual superiority. Sex-craving women now seek Jack, but he can't forget the lay that kicked him out of town. Not content with his newfound celebrity status, he manages to find himself in the middle of trouble with nowhere to hide. Watch now as this tale continues to unfold with treats for your eyes only!
title: Talk Dirty to Me 10
